English.Text: Blood is the only payment they will take. Weakened by the poisoned wine, the leader of the rebels appears on a crutch. His followers part in taciturn awe, as he hobbles forward. "Name your scapegoat," he says. One of the junior officers draws the short straw. "Cut out his eyes!" And with two gruesome oyster scoops, the hierarchy aboard your ship is turned upside down. The Captain has no choice now but to grant several of the rebels positions of authority aboard ship.
